front.title: Web Proxy Auto Discovery Next Generation

abstract.t: This specification aims to modernize Web Proxy Automatic Discovery ([WPAD]) which was defined in 1997. At that time, the World Wide Web was much earlier in its evolution. This specification provides more modern discovery mechanisms and incorporates [PVD] Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/joshco/wpadng.
